Text: superb game. must try for anyone whos into space sims. and for anyone who isnt also.

It took me quite a bit of hardship finding this fine game... I finaly found a copy on the emule network..  a zip file with a clonecd image... but without the subchannels... 

So of i went with isobuster and various cracks to find something that worked, and here you are for your gaming pleasure... Its tried and tested.. I have plaied the first few missions... 

It works, but my flying skills leave a lot to be desired...

You might find this linke usefull

http://www.neoseeker.com/resourcelink.html?rlid=45716&rid=42685

Walkthrough for the game....
